org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio

Class NioSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.mina.core.session.AbstractIoSession
      • org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.NioSession
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IoSession

    public abstract class NioSession
extends AbstractIoSession
    An IoSession which is managed by the NIO transport.
    Author:
    Apache MINA Project
